articles.author: Gianmaria Tammaro
articles.title: Kevin Spacey Honored at Italy’s National Museum of Cinema in First Event Since Sexual Assault Charges - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The 'American Beauty' and 'House of Cards' actor, who faces multiple sexual assault charges in the U.K., praised his manager in his speech: "It's thanks to him that I realized I had to take all the setbacks and mistakes I made and get back on my feet, move on…
articles.content: Italy’s National Museum of Cinema in Turin on Monday paid tribute to Oscar-winning U.S. actor Kevin Spacey, presenting the American Beauty and House of Cards star with its highest honor, the Stella d… [+3144 chars]
